Notes.Note: Ei versiokohtaisia huomautuksia.
Ej anmärkningar gällande denna version.
No version specific notes.
Termistö läpikäyty.
Finska termonologin.
Finnish terminology.

R0987: (fi) selite muutettu: general: Each <Sequence number> is unique for the Data Group it belongs to. The sequence numbers shall be sequential, starting from "1" for the first iteration of the Data Group and increasing by "1" for each iteration. → Jokainen {{FIe-214}} on yksilöllinen sille tietoryhmälle, johon se kuuluu. Niiden on oltava peräkkäisiä alkaen luvusta '1' tietoryhmän ensimmäisellä esiintymiskerralla ja kasvaen luvulla '1' jokaista seuraavaa esiintymiskertaa kohti., (sv) selite muutettu: general: Each <Sequence number> is unique for the Data Group it belongs to. The sequence numbers shall be sequential, starting from "1" for the first iteration of the Data Group and increasing by "1" for each iteration. → Varje {{FIe-214}} är unik för den datagrupp som den tillhör. De ska vara sekventiella, med start från '1' för den första iterationen av datagruppen och ökande med '1' för varje efterföljande iteration., (en) selite muutettu: general: Each <Sequence number> is unique for the Data Group it belongs to. The sequence numbers shall be sequential, starting from "1" for the first iteration of the Data Group and increasing by "1" for each iteration. → Each {{FIe-214}} is unique for the data group is belongs to. They shall be sequential, starting from '1' for the first iteration of the data group and increasing by '1' for each subsequent iteration.

R0028: (fi) selite muutettu: general: The structure of this Data Item is validated as specified in DDCOM. The check digit must follow the ISO 6346 standard. → Tarkistusnumeron on oltava ISO 6346 -standardin mukainen., (sv) selite muutettu: general: The structure of this Data Item is validated as specified in DDCOM. The check digit must follow the ISO 6346 standard. → Kontrollsiffran måste följa ISO 6346-standarden., (en) selite muutettu: general: The structure of this Data Item is validated as specified in DDCOM. The check digit must follow the ISO 6346 standard. → The check digit must follow the ISO 6346 standard.

C0818: (fi) selite muutettu: general: IF /CC034C/Requester/role is EQUAL to "1" THEN /CC034C/GuaranteeReference/Owner = "N" ELSE /CC034C/GuaranteeReference/Owner = "R" → general: IF /CC034D/Requester/role is EQUAL to "1" THEN /CC034D/GuaranteeReference/Owner = "N" ELSE /CC034D/GuaranteeReference/Owner = "R", (sv) selite muutettu: general: IF /CC034C/Requester/role is EQUAL to "1" THEN /CC034C/GuaranteeReference/Owner = "N" ELSE /CC034C/GuaranteeReference/Owner = "R" → general: IF /CC034D/Requester/role is EQUAL to "1" THEN /CC034D/GuaranteeReference/Owner = "N" ELSE /CC034D/GuaranteeReference/Owner = "R", (en) selite muutettu: general: IF /CC034C/Requester/role is EQUAL to "1" THEN /CC034C/GuaranteeReference/Owner = "N" ELSE /CC034C/GuaranteeReference/Owner = "R" → general: IF /CC034D/Requester/role is EQUAL to "1" THEN /CC034D/GuaranteeReference/Owner = "N" ELSE /CC034D/GuaranteeReference/Owner = "R"

R0263: (fi) selite muutettu: general: The Data Item can be used only with Guarantee types ‘0’ (guarantee waiver), ‘1’ (comprehensive guarantee) or ‘9’ (Individual guarantee with multiple usage), with either Query Identifier ‘1’ (usage only) or ‘3’ (usage and exposure) → general: The Data Item can be used only with Guarantee types "0" (guarantee waiver), "1" (comprehensive guarantee) or "9" (Individual guarantee with multiple usage), with either Query Identifier "1" (usage only) or "3" (usage and exposure), (sv) selite muutettu: general: The Data Item can be used only with Guarantee types ‘0’ (guarantee waiver), ‘1’ (comprehensive guarantee) or ‘9’ (Individual guarantee with multiple usage), with either Query Identifier ‘1’ (usage only) or ‘3’ (usage and exposure) → general: The Data Item can be used only with Guarantee types "0" (guarantee waiver), "1" (comprehensive guarantee) or "9" (Individual guarantee with multiple usage), with either Query Identifier "1" (usage only) or "3" (usage and exposure), (en) selite muutettu: general: The Data Item can be used only with Guarantee types ‘0’ (guarantee waiver), ‘1’ (comprehensive guarantee) or ‘9’ (Individual guarantee with multiple usage), with either Query Identifier ‘1’ (usage only) or ‘3’ (usage and exposure) → general: The Data Item can be used only with Guarantee types "0" (guarantee waiver), "1" (comprehensive guarantee) or "9" (Individual guarantee with multiple usage), with either Query Identifier "1" (usage only) or "3" (usage and exposure)

R0850: (fi) selite muutettu: general: IF sender is in EU (CL010) THEN the value must be a valid EORI or TCUIN (validated by receiver, if located in EU), ELSE (sender is not in EU) the value must be a TIN number (validated by the message sender only). The EORI/TCUIN values shall comply with the following pattern: <xs:pattern value=" [A-Z]{2}[\x21-\x7E]{1,15}"/> → EU-toimijoille ilmoitettava voimassa oleva EORI tai TCUIN, muilta vaaditaan voimassa oleva TIN, (sv) selite muutettu: general: IF sender is in EU (CL010) THEN the value must be a valid EORI or TCUIN (validated by receiver, if located in EU), ELSE (sender is not in EU) the value must be a TIN number (validated by the message sender only). The EORI/TCUIN values shall comply with the following pattern: <xs:pattern value=" [A-Z]{2}[\x21-\x7E]{1,15}"/> → För EU-aktörer måste värdet vara ett giltigt EORI eller TCUIN, för andra krävs ett giltigt TIN, (en) selite muutettu: general: IF sender is in EU (CL010) THEN the value must be a valid EORI or TCUIN (validated by receiver, if located in EU), ELSE (sender is not in EU) the value must be a TIN number (validated by the message sender only). The EORI/TCUIN values shall comply with the following pattern: <xs:pattern value=" [A-Z]{2}[\x21-\x7E]{1,15}"/> → For EU traders the value must be a valid EORI or TCUIN, for others the value must be a valid TIN number
